tags.name: responsive-grid-col
tags.description:
`responsive-grid-col`
A column for the responsive grid

attributes.name: xl
attributes.description: the width when viewed on an extra large screen

attributes.name: lg
attributes.description: the width when viewed on a large screen

attributes.name: md
attributes.description: the width when viewed on a medium screen

attributes.name: sm
attributes.description: the width when viewed on a small screen

attributes.name: xs
attributes.description: the width when viewed on an extra-small screen

properties.description: the width when viewed on a large screen

properties.name: sm

properties.name: xs
